edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file
Class SampleIndexFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SampleSentenceData
      edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SampleIndexFactory
public class SampleIndexFactory
extends SampleSentenceData

Maintains a mapping of word senses to sentence template keys. These are used to provide sample templates for a given word form.
